abstract: Intel has made progress in a technology that could lead to the wireless recharging of gadgets and the end of the power-cord spaghetti behind electronic devices.
snippet: Intel has made progress in a technology that could lead to the wireless recharging of gadgets and the end of the power-cord spaghetti behind electronic devices.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Intel has made progress in a technology that could lead to the wireless recharging of gadgets and the end of the power-cord spaghetti behind electronic devices.

headline.main: Intel Moves to Free Gadgets of Their Recharging Cords
headline.print_headline: Intel Moves to Free Gadgets From Their Recharging Cords
